Texts.Chs: 只要按下那个控制台开关，那么你就不会汗流浃背了。
Texts.Eng: Just poke at that there console and you'll be in no sweat.

Texts.Chs: 刚才我设置了某个好玩的玩意儿，他们应该冲着那声音的方向去了。
Texts.Eng: Now I've just finished setting them beauties of charges...a good bang to them, and they go with a minimum of noise.

Texts.Chs: 噢，你是<entityname>，基地通知我你会来到，没想到你花了蛮长时间的。
Texts.Eng: Oh, you're <entityname>. Shore base radioed me to let you know you were coming, took you long enough.

Texts.Chs: 他们将废水直接排入海洋，这样岂不是更糟糕？
Texts.Eng: They be discharging their effluent straight into the ocean, but I guess they can't mess this rock up any worse, aye?

Texts.Chs: 我已经了解了这个废料处理建筑的某个部分运作情况了。
Texts.Eng: Took me a little while to dig all quiet-like, but I've managed to expose part of the facility's waste system.
